duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and oversee outside plant, inside plant cable, and Small Cell Network (SCN) construction projects.
Coordinate local and state permitting, pole and conduit licensing procedures.
Manage multiple construction projects to ensure completion within timelines and budgets.
Represent the company as an expert in construction issues related to infrastructure and equipment installation.
Assist in vendor selection, bid process, and customer meetings as a subject matter expert.
Develop and maintain customer relationships to influence service work awards.
Manage equipment and material procurement and project tracking.
Provide guidance to general contractors and ensure job specifications are met.
Review As-Built drawings and validate quantities for projects.
Collaborate with Network Construction Managers, Project Managers, and other stakeholders to observe and learn from construction activities.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required
